caption:
This photograph shows a man working in an industrial setting. The man appears middle-aged and is balding with short, light-colored hair. He is wearing a sleeveless blue shirt and white gloves, suggesting that he is involved in some form of manual or mechanical labor.

The man is operating a large machine, which includes various mechanical parts and wiring. The machine has a rectangular orange safety shield, and the man is handling a long, white, flexible tubing or material that is coming out from this machine. His expression is concentrated and focused on his task.

The setting around him looks like a workshop or factory floor with visible brick walls and industrial equipment in the background, enhancing the industrial feel of the scene. There is a slight bluish tint to the image, possibly due to the lighting conditions in the environment or the age of the photograph. The focus and framing on the worker and machine, along with the blurred background, draw attention to his activity and the intricacies of the machinery he is operating.
title: Employee of the b.  F.  Goodrich co.  Working on a machine that makes molding for magnetic doors seals for various bRands of refrigerators, the firm employs 184 people which makes it the third largest employer in town behind the 3m co.( Minnesota mining and manufacturing) with 1,377 and kraft foods with 487, New Ulm is a country seat of 13,000 in a farming area of south central Minnesota founded in 1854 by a german immigrant land company
